data.collection_status:
STATUS dd Mon YYYY: Describe project rifcs status here.
WHAT IS GIVEN BELOW IS A SKELETAL RECURSOIVE OUTLINE FOR A COLLECTION OF RIFCS OBJECTS PLEASE MODIFY AS REQUIRED FOR YOUR PROJECT. Each hyperlink provides a html rendition of the RIF-CS and has been generated by a XSLT stylesheet which acts upon the RIF-CS XML. From each HTML file, the RIF-CS can be obtained individually (see the Local Metadata links at bottom of the "ANDS registration..." section).
To get the complete set of RIF-CS objects for Founders and Survivors in one XML instance:
SUBMIT FOR HARVEST (static): http://dev.founders-and-survivors.org/pub/ands/rifcs/DEFAULT-ALL_yyyymmdd_rifcs.xml (manually copied here)
UNDER DEVELOPMENT (dynamic): http://dev.founders-and-survivors.org/pub/collections/view/DEFAULT:ALL
Issues to be resolved over time:
* two-way (directional) relationships in relatedObjects requires data duplication? i.e. relatedObject entries have to be present on each object - is this the intended way of working? - if so, how will these relationships be validated/maintained Note that the index of objects below, which allows recursion, was developed to assist the content provider deal with this issue.
* service-service "hasPart" is not directional; added "isPartOf" to cover this omission (See http://ands.org.au/guides/cpguide/cpgrelatedobject.html)
* awaiting process for institutional assignment of ANDS keys (the local system uses its own "local" identifiers as a key)
data.desc:
WHAT IS GIVEN BELOW IS A SKELETAL RECURSIVE OUTLINE FOR A COLLECTION OF RIFCS OBJECTS FOR ANY RESEARCH PROJECT WITH A PUBLIC WEBSITE INCORPORATING A PUBLIC SEARCH AND OTHER PUBLIC COLLABORATIVE SERVICES, AND A STAFF/RESTRICTED ACCESS WEBSITE.
PLEASE MODIFY AS REQUIRED FOR YOUR PROJECT.
This is the DEFAULT master list of resources. @n sequence @ands_deployment="true" means the associated rif-cs object is deployed to ands @public_access="true" means the resource is public
Elements: localid: W=website | S=service | C=collection , number NNN, [tr] means transcription label : local name in this system uri : unique id in this system electronic_url @scope=(prod_public|prod|dev_public|dev|test) If 'test', url is included in full By default prod/dev is the staff server

list.NOTE: Exemplar only - please modify as required for your site
